ABOUT ME

I love technology

I grew up in a small town named Dexter, Michigan. It's the kind of town where there is no fast food chains, or major stores. Its so small, you felt like you could throw a rock at the beginning of the town, and it would land at the end. Because its such a small town, everyone knew everyone. And I was know for being that weird kid. I spent all my time behind a screen, and learning as much as I could about various programs and future technology. I remember in highschool, my friend and I would always pull pranks on our friends, and find ways to hack into their gaming accounts by creating keyloggers they would fall for through phising emails we created. Although it may be childish behavior, the feeling of when my fist keylogger hack work, changed everything for me. After that point, I started to look at everything differently. I remember always thinking about the minds that went behind making a code that later turn into an art. As I got older, I chose to enroll in college classes to learn about information technology, and really focused on Linux based programming.
